https://tmrev.io/movie/52528-Bloodbath at the House of Death 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6K5CzOmI5TFmpdJ8s0adURMY3lx.jpg Six scientists arrive at the creepy Headstone Manor to investigate a strange phenomena which was the site of a mysterious massacre years earlier where 18 guests were killed in one night. It turns out that the house is the place of a satanic cult lead by a sinister monk who plans to kill the scientists who are inhabiting this house of Satan. Bloodbath at the House of Death
